video.title: Digimon: Digital Monsters
video.synopsis: Tai, Matt, Sora, Izzy, Mimi, Joe and T.K. come across seven Digivices and are transported to a strange digital world where they meet new friends.

episodes.synopsis: Seven campers come across seven Digivices and are transported to the Digital World, where they meet creatures who claim to be their chosen partners.
episodes.title: And So It Begins..

episodes.synopsis: The kids come across a beach with numerous phone booths, but none of them seem to work. As they sit down for a break to eat, a wild Shellmon appears.
episodes.title: The Birth of Greymon

episodes.synopsis: The kids run away from a Monochromon battle. They come across a trolley car on a small island and decide to spend the night in it.
episodes.title: Garurumon

episodes.synopsis: A Meramon attacks a village, and Biyomon digivolves to Birdramon to defeat him, causing a Black Gear to be expelled from his body.
episodes.title: Biyomon Gets Firepower

episodes.synopsis: The kids stumble upon an Andromon in trouble. Yet after they help him, he attacks them! Izzy discovers coding to digivolve Tentomon into Kabuterimon.
episodes.title: Kabuterimon's Electro Shocker

episodes.synopsis: While escaping an assault in the sewers, the kids are split up and Mimi ends up in Toy Town after being attacked by a Monzaemon.
episodes.title: Togemon in Toy Town

episodes.synopsis: Tai and Matt argue whether they should climb Infinity Mountain. Meanwhile, Joe and Gomamon decide to climb the mountain by themselves.
episodes.title: Ikkakumon's Harpoon Torpedo

episodes.synopsis: The kids meet the ruler of File Island, Devimon, who pursues the kids by breaking the island and separating the kids onto each piece.
episodes.title: Evil Shows His Face

episodes.synopsis: Tai and Agumon land on a snow-covered island and are forced to battle a Frigimon. After destroying the Black Gear, they learn Matt has hypothermia.
episodes.title: Subzero Ice Punch!

episodes.synopsis: Mimi and Palmon escape Sukamon and Chuumon, and cross over to the next island where Izzy and Tentomon landed. But they end up getting lost!
episodes.title: A Clue from the Digi-Past

episodes.synopsis: Joe and Gomamon find themselves on an island with Sora and Biyomon. They are captured by a band of Bakemon intent on eating them.
episodes.title: The Dancing Digimon

episodes.synopsis: T.K. and Patamon land in Primary Village, where all Digimon are born. Mistaken for intruders, they are confronted by the guardian of the baby Digimon.
episodes.title: DigiBaby Boom

episodes.synopsis: The group reunites and is attacked by Leomon, who explains the prophecies of the DigiDestined. The group returns to Infinity Mountain for a showdown.
episodes.title: The Legend of the DigiDestined

episodes.synopsis: Gennai urges the group to travel to Server to defeat another enemy, and tells them about Crests that will allow Digimon to digivolve further.
episodes.title: Depature for a New Continent

episodes.synopsis: The kids are confronted by Etemon, who uses his Dark Network to prevent the Digimon from digivolving and then traps the group inside a cave.
episodes.title: The Dark Network of Etemon

episodes.synopsis: While the group is traveling through the desert, they become trapped in a coliseum by Etemon.
episodes.title: The Arrival of SkullGreymon

episodes.synopsis: After getting lost in the desert, the group is taken aboard a ship helmed by Kokatorimon, who captures all the boys and their partners.
episodes.title: The Crest of Sincerity

episodes.synopsis: The group is attacked by a Kuwagamon, and Tai fails to digivolve Agumon. Piximon manages to intervene and offers to train them at his facility.
episodes.title: The Piximon Cometh

episodes.synopsis: T.K. discovers his Crest of Hope and a cave with Digi-code. Izzy receives an e-mail from Datamon asking for help from within Etemon's headquarters.
episodes.title: The Prisoner of the Pyramid

episodes.synopsis: Tai manages to rescue Sora, while Datamon pulls himself and Etemon into the Dark Network. When Etemon reappears, Greymon digivolves into MetalGreymon.
episodes.title: The Earthquake of MetalGreymon

episodes.synopsis: Tai and Koromon discover that Digimon are appearing in the Real World and decide they must go back to the Digital World to help their friends.
episodes.title: Home Away from Home

episodes.synopsis: Tai and Agumon return, and Tokomon relays what happened: The group has separated and DemiDevimon has tricked T.K. into becoming his "friend."
episodes.title: Forget About It!

episodes.synopsis: Matt, Gabumon, Joe and Gomamon are forced to work at Digitamamon's diner to pay off a meal.
episodes.title: WereGarurumon's Diner

episodes.synopsis: Izzy is trapped in Vademon's pocket dimension and robbed of his curiosity. DemiDevimon attempts to buy Izzy's Crest from Vademon.
episodes.title: No Questions, Please

episodes.synopsis: Joe and Tai find Mimi being treated like a princess at a palace. Sora convinces her to sing and awaken ShogunGekomom.
episodes.title: Princess Karaoke

episodes.synopsis: Sora tells the group about the meanings of their Crests and how DemiDevimon said her Crest would never glow.
episodes.title: Sora's Crest of Love

episodes.synopsis: Gennai says there is an eighth DigiDestined -- and that Myotismon is planning to go to the Real World with an army of Digimon to find him or her.
episodes.title: The Gateway to Home

episodes.synopsis: The group visits Gennai's home, where he unravels some secrets about the Digital World. The kids return to the castle to open the gate.
episodes.title: It's All in the Cards

episodes.synopsis: The kids return to camp to find the eighth child. A battle between Garudamon and Mammothmon helps them recall a battle they witnessed years earlier.
episodes.title: Return to Highton View Terrace

episodes.synopsis: The DigiDestined have a series of misadventures trying to get back to their homes in Odaiba. Eventually, they get a ride from Sora's cousin, Duane.
episodes.title: Almost Home Free

episodes.synopsis: At long last, the DigiDestined return to their homes. Kari's Digivice, which she has no knowledge of, gets taken away by her cat.
episodes.title: The Eighth Digivice

episodes.synopsis: The DigiDestined continue their search for the eighth child. Gatomon crosses paths with Kari and wonders if she could be the one they seek.
episodes.title: Gatomon Comes Calling

episodes.synopsis: As the DigiDestined continue their search, Matt and T.K. run into two servants of Myotismon, who are more interested in fun than helping Myotismon.
episodes.title: Out on the Town

episodes.synopsis: Wizardmon learns that Kari is the eighth DigiDestined child and that Gatomon is her partner, so he plans to bring the two together.
episodes.title: The Eighth Child Revealed

episodes.synopsis: Myotismon creates a barrier of fog around Odaiba, and evil Digimon roam the streets. Bakemon and Phantomon begin taking hostages.
episodes.title: Flower Power

episodes.synopsis: Myotismon uses Gatomon to try and identify the eighth child. Found out by Phantomon, Kari gives herself up so that Matt and Sora are not harmed.
episodes.title: City Under Siege

episodes.synopsis: The DigiDestined are reunited. Wizardmon saves Kari and Gatomon, but he puts his own life at risk.
episodes.title: Wizardmon's Gift

episodes.synopsis: An ancient DigiWorld prophecy comes true when Myotismon returns as VenomMyotismon.
episodes.title: Prophecy

episodes.synopsis: WarGreymon and MetalGarurumon defeat VenomMyotismon. But immediately afterward they must leave for the Digital World, which is in danger again.
episodes.title: The Battle for Earth

episodes.synopsis: As the DigiDestined return to the Digital World, they learn of the four Dark Masters, mega-level Digimon who have taken over the place.
episodes.title: Enter the Dark Masters

episodes.synopsis: The kids manage to escape MetalSeadramon's minion, Scorpiomon. They try to escape by sea, but are immediately stopped by MetalSeadramon.
episodes.title: Seasick and Tired

episodes.synopsis: Just as the kids are about to be destroyed by MetalSeadramon, Whamon comes to their rescue and they flee to the bottom of the ocean.
episodes.title: Under Pressure

episodes.synopsis: Whamon helps WarGreymon, who finally manages to defeat MetalSeadramon. The kids then go into a forest were they are continually taunted by Puppetmon.
episodes.title: Pinocchimon's Deadly Game

episodes.synopsis: Matt is tricked by Cherrymon into believing that Tai is his enemy. Meanwhile, Puppetmon's Garbagemon platoon is handled by Lillymon and MetalGreymon.
episodes.title: Yamato and the Forest of Delusion

episodes.synopsis: Tensions run high as a fight breaks out between Matt and Tai as well as their Digimon partners. Kari's body is taken over by a strange entity.
episodes.title: The Ultimate Clash

episodes.synopsis: Etemon returns as MetalEtemon to take revenge on the DigiDestined. Joe and Mimi rescue Ogremon, who was injured when Woodmon attacked him.
episodes.title: Etomon's Come Back Tour

episodes.synopsis: Leomon returns as SaberLeomon and saves Joe and Mimi from MetalEtemon. But can he repeat his valiant act a second time?
episodes.title: Ogremon's Honor

episodes.synopsis: Kari falls ill, and Tai becomes hysterical in his attempts to help her. Machinedramon attacks the group in a mechanical city that's under his control.
episodes.title: My Sister's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: Kari recovers and, with Sora and T.K., begins searching for the others. They run into a group of Numemon who have been enslaved by WaruMonzaemon.
episodes.title: The Crest of Light

episodes.synopsis: Joe goes off on his own to find Matt. Angewomon faces off against LadyDevimon, one of Piedmon's servants.
episodes.title: Joe's Battle

episodes.synopsis: Piedmon and WarGreymon engage in battle, although WarGreymon seems to be no match for him. Matt confronts his inner darkness, as does Sora.
episodes.title: The Crest of Friendship

episodes.synopsis: Piedmon begins to turn the kids and Digimon into keychains. After nearly all allies are stopped, T.K. realizes the hope his brother Matt has for him.
episodes.title: Piedmon's Last Jest

episodes.synopsis: The Dark Masters are defeated, but it isn't enough to stop the destruction of the Digital World. The kids are forced to face the true mastermind.
episodes.title: Now Aploycomon

episodes.synopsis: The DigiDestined prepare to spend the rest of their summer in the Digital World. However, they learn they must either leave quickly or remain forever.
episodes.title: The Fate of Two Worlds

episodes.synopsis: Three new DigiDestineds -- Davis, Yolei and Cody -- receive their digivices and embark on an adventure. Meanwhile, Davis meets Veemon, his partner.
episodes.title: Enter Flamedramon

episodes.synopsis: Yolei and Cody meet their partners, Hawkmon and Armadillomon. When Davis and Veemon are captured by the Digimon Emperor, the others must save them.
episodes.title: The Digiteam Complete

episodes.synopsis: The group travels again to the Digital World, only to be attacked by the Digimon Emperor. As they hide, T.K. and Kari discover their own Digi-Eggs.
episodes.title: A New Digitude

episodes.synopsis: Gabumon is captured after causing an uprising in a Gazimon village. Matt and the rest of the new DigiDestined go to the Digital World to save him.
episodes.title: Iron Vegiemon

episodes.synopsis: Gomamon is injured and left for dead by the Digimon Emperor. Joe goes with the new DigiDestined to save him, but soon afterward, Cody gets hurt.
episodes.title: Old Reliable

episodes.synopsis: Mimi and the new DigiDestined have a picnic in the Digital World. But Mimi falls into a hole and, along with Yolei, is separated from the group.
episodes.title: Family Picnic

episodes.synopsis: After trying to destroy a control spire located in a city, Kari is separated from the rest of the group. Davis and T.K. return to rescue her.
episodes.title: Guardian Angel

episodes.synopsis: Davis's soccer team is playing against genius Ken Ichijouji's team. The DigiDestined later uncover a secret about their rival.
episodes.title: Ken's Secret

episodes.synopsis: Ken runs away from home, preferring to remain in the Digital World instead. He captures Agumon and forces him to dark digivolve.
episodes.title: The Emperor's New Home

episodes.synopsis: Angry at his inability to control SkullGreymon, Ken works on his Dark Ring. Wormmon, hoping that Ken might use him in his experiments, frees Agumon.
episodes.title: The Captive Digimon

episodes.synopsis: After finding a Digi-Egg, the DigiDestined are attacked by Flymon and MetalGreymon, who are under the control of the Emperor's improved Dark Spiral.
episodes.title: Storm of Friendship

episodes.synopsis: Biyomon goes missing, and the team ends up in a town that appears to be straight out of a cowboy film.
episodes.title: The Good, the Bad, and the Digi

episodes.synopsis: Kari is dragged into a realm that is neither the real world nor the Digital World. T.K., Gatomon and Patamon try to follow her.
episodes.title: His Master's Voice

episodes.synopsis: The new DigiDestined come across a diner that's owned by Digitamamon, who swears he isn't evil anymore.
episodes.title: The Samurai of Sincerity

episodes.synopsis: The DigiDestined travel to a town out of the ancient Japanese Edo period, and wind up fighting in a ninja showdown!
episodes.title: Big Trouble in Little Edo

episodes.synopsis: As the DigiDestined search beneath the sea for a Digi-Egg, they get stuck under an oil platform after being pursued by MegaSeadramon.
episodes.title: 20,000 Digi-Leagues Under the Sea

episodes.synopsis: Both the old and new DigiDestined gather to celebrate the anniversary of the day when they first entered into the Digital World.
episodes.title: Ghost of a Chance

episodes.synopsis: The DigiDestined decide to remain in the Digital World until they locate Ken's base, with Tai, Matt and Izzy using a camping trip as a cover story.
episodes.title: Run Yolei Run

episodes.synopsis: All of the new DigiDestined -- except for Davis, who can't fly to the location -- plan to sneak into Ken's base.
episodes.title: An Old Enemy Returns

episodes.synopsis: Wormmon leads Davis and Veemon to the base's power source. It turns out to be a golden Digi-egg, which Davis uses to digivolve Veemon to Magnamon.
episodes.title: The Darkness Before Dawn

episodes.synopsis: Kimeramon and Magnamon fight. Ken's base explodes, and Wormmon gives all the power he has to help Magnamon defeat Kimeramon.
episodes.title: The Crest of Kindness

episodes.synopsis: Davis, in an effort to catch Kari's attention, wants Veemon to evolve like Patamon. His effort only manages to anger a Tortomon.
episodes.title: Davis Cries Wolfmon

episodes.synopsis: Ken reminisces about his brother, Sam, and when he first went into the Digital World (despite his temporary amnesia in the real world).
episodes.title: Genesis of Evil

episodes.synopsis: Davis, Kari and T.K. find that their Digimon can't digivolve. Cody is attacked by Thundermon, leading to Armadillomon's unexpected digivolution.
episodes.title: If I had a Tail Hammer

episodes.synopsis: The strange woman changes control spires into digimon. She turns one into a Golemon who tries to destroy a dam where Mimi and Palmon are.
episodes.title: Spirit Needle

episodes.synopsis: The DigiDestined see that Ken's base is about to explode. Okuwamon, a digimon made from control spires, attacks the DigiDestined.
episodes.title: United We Stand

episodes.synopsis: Paildramon and Okuwamon continue fighting. Ken puts his crest of kindness into a slot in the base, but it does not do anything.
episodes.title: Fusion Confusion

episodes.synopsis: The DigiDestined arrive at Giga House, where the strange woman awaits. As they draw closer, the group is attacked by different insect Digimon.
episodes.title: The Insect Master's Trap

episodes.synopsis: Yolei creates a counter to the strange woman's music (because she worked with Matt's band). She transforms into a Digimon called Arukenimon.
episodes.title: Arukenimon's Tangled Web

episodes.synopsis: While Cody's doubts about Ken causes Ken to leave the group, Mummymon and Arukenimon combine a hundred control spires to create BlackWarGreymon.
episodes.title: Ultimate Anti-Hero

episodes.synopsis: While searching for Gatomon's tail ring, Yolei, Kari, Ken and their Digimon stumble into the Dark Ocean.
episodes.title: Opposites Attract

episodes.synopsis: BlackWarGreymon has a discussion about life with Agumon.
episodes.title: If I Only had a Heart

episodes.synopsis: While on a school trip, Yolei encounters BlackWarGreymon and several other digimon in the real world after the mega destroyed a second Destiny Stone.
episodes.title: A Chance Encounter

episodes.synopsis: When BlackWarGreymon destroys the third stone, a Digimon briefly appears. BlackWarGreymon becomes convinced that this is his worthy opponent.
episodes.title: Destiny in Doubt

episodes.synopsis: Worried about T.K., Cody goes to see Matt, who tells him about how T.K. still carries the scars from the battle against Devimon.
episodes.title: Cody Takes a Stand

episodes.synopsis: The DigiDestined head out to eat at another restaurant -- this one serves an enticing soup. There they run into Arukenimon and Mummymon.
episodes.title: Stone Soup

episodes.synopsis: While the DNA-digivolved Digimon hold off BlackWarGreymon, Davis thinks of moving the last Destiny Stone with the D3s, which summons Azulongmon.
episodes.title: Kyoto Dragon

episodes.synopsis: As Christmas nears, the DigiDestined are in a festive mood. Ken goes so far as to throw a party -- the first time he's been happy in a long time.
episodes.title: A Very Digi-Christmas

episodes.synopsis: The DigiDestined receive one of Azulongmon's Digicores, which results in Paildramon mega-digivolving into Imperialdramon Dragon Mode.
episodes.title: Dramon Power

episodes.synopsis: The Japanese DigiDestined split up. Mimi and Davis team up with the American DigiDestined, while Kari and Izzy go to help those in Asia.
episodes.title: Digimon World Tour: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In Australia, Cody and Joe meet with Derek to fight marine Digimon. In Paris, T.K. and Tai must save a French DigiDestined being held in Versailles.
episodes.title: Digimon World Tour: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Ken and Matt help a Mexican DigiDestined, while Sora and Yolei help those in Russia and Siberia. But they all must return back in time for Christmas.
episodes.title: Digimon World Tour: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: A new enemy, Daemon, appears. With the help of Azulongmon's power, Imperialdramon Dragon Mode triumphs by changing into his Fighter Mode!
episodes.title: Invasion of the Daemon Corps

episodes.synopsis: Oikawa kidnaps Ken and uses his Dark Spore to create new ones to implant in gathered children. Meanwhile, Daemon's servants engage the DigiDestined.
episodes.title: Dark Sun, Dark Spore

episodes.synopsis: Oikawa, having no more use for Ken, tries to hand him off to Daemon. The other DigiDestined arrive, and Ken is able to open a gate to the Dark Ocean.
episodes.title: The Dark Gate

episodes.synopsis: BlackWarGreymon confronts Oikawa, who tells him the truth about his creation. The digimon tries to destroy Oikawa, but two others intervene.
episodes.title: Duel of the WarGreymon

episodes.synopsis: One of the children's Dark Spores grows into a Dark Flower, which is harvested by Oikawa -- despite the DigiDestined's best efforts to stop him.
episodes.title: Black WarGreymon's Destiny

episodes.synopsis: Oikawa and the kids infected with the Dark Spores try to go to the Digital World, but, due to BlackWarGreymon's sealing the gate, travel elsewhere.
episodes.title: Oikawa's Shame

episodes.synopsis: MaloMyotismon tempts the DigiDestined with illusions of their dreams, but Davis, whose dreamt that ExVeemon could defeat the villain, guides them out.
episodes.title: The Last Temptation of the DigiDestined

episodes.synopsis: The six DigiDestined, assisted by DigiDestined all over the world and Oikawa's gathered children, seek to destroy MaloMyotismon.
episodes.title: A Million Points of Light

episodes.synopsis: While a mysterious Digimon named Calumon appears in the Real World, a boy named Takato Matsuki finds an unusual blue card.
episodes.title: Guilmon Comes Alive

episodes.synopsis: Takato is thrilled that he's now partners with a real Digimon -- but when Guilmon follows him to school and causes chaos, Takato panics.
episodes.title: Digimon, Digimon Everywhere

episodes.synopsis: Takato panics at the idea of losing Guilmon, but Rika's annoyed by the lack of data on the dinosaur and by Renamon's seeming inability to defeat him.
episodes.title: To Fight or Not to Fight

episodes.synopsis: Gargomon manages to de-digivolve to Terriermon, and Henry is left thinking about destroying real living Digimon after talking to Rika.
episodes.title: It Came from the Other Side

episodes.synopsis: When Calumon watches kids playing soccer, he dreams of being a great player and convinces Guilmon to come out of hiding and play with him.
episodes.title: Dream a Little Dream

episodes.synopsis: Rika is disappointed with her mother and with Renamon. Renamon goes alone to meet Impmon, who tells her she doesn't need a human to make her stronger.
episodes.title: O Partner, Where Art Thou?

episodes.synopsis: While passing by a tunnel, Guilmon begins to disappear. Worried that he'll disappear forever, he seeks help from the other Tamers.
episodes.title: Now You See It, Now You Don't

episodes.synopsis: Impmon is scaring couples at night in the park, but Takato suspects Guilmon of causing the trouble. Later, Devidramon appears and fights Guilmon.
episodes.title: A Question of Trust

episodes.synopsis: Takato tries to make Growlmon de-digivolve into Guilmon, but to no avail. When it begins to rain, Takato despairs of ever getting his old friend back.
episodes.title: Not as Seen on TV

episodes.synopsis: Rika is being followed by something strange. Not wanting to admit she's scared, she refuses help from Renamon, causing Renamon to feel bad.
episodes.title: The Icemon Cometh

episodes.synopsis: When Musyamon attacks, Henry and Takato respond. But Guilmon isn't able to win this battle alone, and Henry is dealing with an internal battle.
episodes.title: Much Ado About Musyamon

episodes.synopsis: Rika and Renamon have decided they don't need each other -- until Harpymon attacks and they realize how much they depend on each other.
episodes.title: Divided They Stand

episodes.synopsis: Takato and Guilmon are about to defeat a DarkLizardmon when Yamaki arrives and captures it. Back at Hypnos, they scan the data of the Digimon.
episodes.title: Juggernaut

episodes.synopsis: The Tamers fight a tiger Digimon who attacks them. But it's too strong for Rika and Henry, so Takato uses the power of the Blue Card to digivolve.
episodes.title: Grow Mon Grow

episodes.synopsis: Takato is depressed when Henry and Rika can't go Digimon patrolling, but he feels better when he goes with Guilmon to play with his school friends.
episodes.title: Snakes, Trains, and Digimon

episodes.synopsis: Takato, Henry, Guilmon, Terriermon and D have fun during a school camping trip -- but a series of blackouts causes the gang to get suspicious.
episodes.title: Back to Nature, Back to Battle

episodes.synopsis: Kenta's friend Jeramie gives Henry a seemingly worthless card that turns out to be a Blue Card, so the Tamers try to find out where it came from.
episodes.title: Duel with the Deva

episodes.synopsis: Rika is having a hard time with her mother, who forces her to attend a photo session. Meanwhile, Renamon has been acting distant.
episodes.title: Digital Beauty

episodes.synopsis: Impmon declares that he hates humans. While the Tamers are battling the Horse Deva Indramon, Impmon decides to battle this Deva all by himself.
episodes.title: Impmon's Last Stand

episodes.synopsis: Impmon continues to battle Indramon with no success. Yamaki reunites the Monster Makers in an effort to find a way to destroy all Digimon.
episodes.title: Out of the Blue

episodes.synopsis: When Jeri meets Leomon after being attacked by the latest Deva Digimon, she recognizes her love for Digimon and believes Leomon is her partner.
episodes.title: Jeri's Quest

episodes.synopsis: When the Pig Deva appears, the Tamers find themselves outmatched and unable to handle the situation, as Vikaralamon is enormous and is wreaking havoc.
episodes.title: The Boar Wars

episodes.synopsis: Just when the Tamers defeat Vikarylamon, the strange child they keep running into reveals himself to be the Monkey Deva and kidnaps Calumon.
episodes.title: A World Apart

episodes.synopsis: Determined to rescue Calumon, the intrepid Tamers manage to find a way to travel into the Digital World.
episodes.title: The Journey Begins

episodes.synopsis: The Tamers finally make it to the Digital World and meet a Meramon and a bunch of Jagyamon. A data stream appears and sucks up some of the Tamers.
episodes.title: Brave New Digital World

episodes.synopsis: Blown far away from the other Tamers, Rika and the gang meet married Jijimon and Babamon -- and Kazu and Kenta ask the couple to be their partners.
episodes.title: Kazu and Kenta's Excellent Adventure

episodes.synopsis: While searching for Rika and the others, Takato, Jeri and Henry discover a village full of Chuchidarumon. The motorcycle, Behemoth, goes on a rampage.
episodes.title: Motorcycle Madness

episodes.synopsis: Rika, Kazu and Kenta get sucked into yet another data stream and end up in a strange place, where they're attacked by a Megadramon.
episodes.title: Blame It on Ryo

episodes.synopsis: Takato and the others meet up with Ryo, Kazu and Kenta in yet another strange area. Rika goes off by herself, while Calumon searches for everyone.
episodes.title: Goliath

episodes.synopsis: While Takato and the others continue searching for Rika, Guilmon picks up Calumon's scent. Meanwhile, Beelzemon comes across a bunch of Chrysalimon.
episodes.title: The Imperfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: When Rika and the others encounter an Andromon, they help him fight Orochimon, a snake Digimon who's been terrorizing a bunch of Gekomon.
episodes.title: Kazu's Upgrade

episodes.synopsis: Takato and Henry find a strange library in the Digital World where they talk to a friend of Henry's Dad who was on the team that created Digimon.
episodes.title: Shibumi Speaks

episodes.synopsis: Henry's little sister, Suzie Wong, arrives and quickly befriends Antylamon, the Rabbit Deva Digimon. Henry, Takato and Terriermon track her down.
episodes.title: Rabbit Transit

episodes.synopsis: As the gang meets up again, they are attacked by Beelzemon. Takato forces Guilmon to digivolve to his Mega Form ... but something goes wrong.
episodes.title: Lionheart

episodes.synopsis: With the unfortunate help of dark digivolution, Guilmon digivolves into Megidramon. Megidramon battles Beezlemon and almost kills him.
episodes.title: Give a Little Bit

episodes.synopsis: Gallantmon faces Beelzemon in a tough battle. Meanwhile, the Sovereign sends his last Deva Chatsuramon to destroy Lopmon for being a traitor.
episodes.title: The Battle Within

episodes.synopsis: The crew meets Zhuqiaomon. Henry struggles with self-doubt, while Terriormon needs to boost his confidence if they're going to defeat their foe.
episodes.title: No Mon Is an Island

episodes.synopsis: After the degeneration of MegaGargomon, the Tamers learn that Zhuqiaomon is still alive and still wants to fight -- and he soon attacks them.
episodes.title: Azulongmon Explains It All

episodes.synopsis: In their attempt to save Calumon from the D-Reaper, Rika and Renamon take a leap of faith and biomerge -- thus creating Sakuyamon.
episodes.title: Song of Sakuyamon

episodes.synopsis: The team races to get to Janyu's Ark before their time runs out, but after Renamon picks up Impmon's scent, Rika and Renamon rush to save him.
episodes.title: Janyu's Ark

episodes.synopsis: After much difficulty, the Tamers and their partners finally arrive at the Real World, and the Arc is dragged to the Digital world.
episodes.title: Homeward Bound

episodes.synopsis: The Tamers return to the Real World. Takato sees Jeri home when he learns her parents aren't coming to get her -- but Jeri is acting weird.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: The team finally confronts the D-Reaper, but they soon realize that it's able to mimic their attacks -- and they're unable to bio-merge.
episodes.title: Beezlemon's Big Day

episodes.synopsis: The team meets a strange goth girl. Her unusual dog turns out to be Dobermon, a messenger of the Sovereigns. Better yet, he has a gift for the Tamers.
episodes.title: The Messenger

episodes.synopsis: The D-Reaper has been spying on the team all along, and it finally reveals itself when Takato falls into the depths of the Reaper with Guilmon.
episodes.title: The D'Reaper's Disguise

episodes.synopsis: Justimon, a mysterious new Digimon who's half-man and half-cyborg, arrives to help the Tamers in their efforts to destroy the D-Reaper.
episodes.title: When Is a Mon Justimon

episodes.synopsis: Calumon finds Jeri in the heart of the D-Reaper. Meanwhile, Takato tries to convince Jeri's father to stop being angry with her.
episodes.title: His Kingdom for a Horse

episodes.synopsis: Grani is fully developed. Calumon tries to help awaken Jeri, who's in the Kernel Sphere. Meanwhile, Beelzemon tries to break open the Kernel Sphere.
episodes.title: Shadow of the Beast King

episodes.synopsis: The Tamers try to get into Kemel Sphere to save Jeri and Calumon, but they receive a message to leave the area because of a pending army attack.
episodes.title: D'Reaper's Feast

episodes.synopsis: The Tamers enter the D-Reaper to rescue Jeri. Meanwhile, everyone at Hypnos is working to revert the D-Reaper to its original harmless form.
episodes.title: Jeri Fights Back

episodes.synopsis: Gallantmon seems to be making some headway in his new form. Meanwhile, the others are losing as they try to destroy the Cable Reaper.
episodes.title: Such Sweet Sorrow
